name: COWS VS ALIENS (itch)
description:
Talking points of your game?

This is my first attempt at pixel art games, was a fun experience learning about pixel-art animations, also is my first "complete gamejam", there is so much i wanted to have done but i ran out of time!.

Time spent working on your game?
5 days

What assets did you use?
The background music is from the amazing Lloyde Sorrow,
and the only premade asset i used was the Free GameJamUI from unity.
